title: UK trade officials hail Guyana’s rapid economic rise
description:
The United Kingdom’s visiting trade mission was hosted last evening at a reception at the Bel Air residence of British High Commissioner Jane Miller, where UK officials highlighted Guyana’s economic momentum and reaffirmed their interest in deeper long-term partnerships across several sectors.

title: Canadian delegation exploring investment opportunities in Guyana
description:
The Guyana Office for Investment this morning engaged with a visiting Canadian delegation exploring new avenues for partnership and collaboration in Guyana, demonstrating the continued commitment of both countries to deepening economic ties and identifying areas for mutually beneficial growth.

title: Essequibo women entrepreneurs shine at second pitch fest
description: The WeLead Association successfully hosted the 2nd Annual Innovate Pitch Fest, an initiative designed to empower women entrepreneurs across Region Two and neighbouring communities through funding, capacity-building and increased visibility. title: National Quality Policy being developed to improve standards across all sectors
description:
The Ministry of Tourism, Industry, and Commerce in collaboration with the Guyana National Bureau of Standards (GNBS) is developing a National Quality Policy, intended to improve standards across all industries in both the private and public sectors.

title: 2025 mid-year report highlights several gains to the working-class
description:
